mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_vote_title VALUES (b_vote_seq.nextval, #{userId }, #{className }, #{voteTitle }, SYSDATE, (select class_no from b_class where class_name = #{className }))
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_phone_id from b_user a,b_class b WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and b.class_name = #{className }

SELECT vote_title AS voteTitle, class_name AS className, to_char(created_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS createdDate, vote_number AS voteNumber, class_no as classNo FROM b_vote_title WHERE class_no in (select class_no from b_class_user where user_no in (select user_no from b_user where user_id = #{userId }))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_vote_answer VALUES ((select user_no from b_user where user_id = #{userId }), #{voteNumber }, #{voteContent } )
mapper.select: select vote_content from b_vote_answer where vote_number = #{voteNumber } and user_No in (select user_No from b_user where user_id = #{userId})

select vt.vote_number as voteNumber, a..vote_content as voteContent, vt.vote_title as voteTitle, vt.class_name as className, vt.user_id as userId from b_vote_title vt, b_vote_content vc, b_vote_answer a where a.vote_number = #{voteNumber}
